title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message:
i have macbook pro A1708 with 1.2 volt on the fuse near U3200 and when i put usb amp meter  the light flash without any reading
the 2nd usb c work good and the computer work good
i want to ask if i change the usb c port solve this problem.
thanks

title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message: Post diode mode on the fuse and CC1/2 pins of U3200.

title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message:
pin 1 and the fuse open just OL
pin 2 and the fuse  open OL

title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message: cc1/2 and the fuse ---- open circuit

title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message: You MUST check with red probe at ground; black probe on test point.

title: 820-00840 1st usb c port not work
message:
Inspect the pins inside that USB-C port.
Also check continuity from USB port to corresponding CD3215 area.
